actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reimburse the Shoshone and Arapahoe Tribes of the Wind River Reservation, Wyo., for tribal funds that were expended to benefit only individuals in the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Wind River irrigation project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to reimburse the Shoshone and Arapahoe Tribes of the Wind River Reservation, Wyoming, for tribal funds that were expended to benefit only individuals in the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Wind River irrigation project.

titles.title: A bill to reimburse the Shoshone and Arapahoe Tribes of the Wind River Reservation, Wyo., for tribal funds that were expended to benefit only individuals in the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Wind River irrigation project.
